Our new applicant has requested that you provide a reference in support of his/her application to become a member of Community Time Exchange. 
We are a non-profit organization and Hour Exchange that builds community. Every exchange is based on time. 
Members earn and spend hours, with every hour equal regardless of the service. We respect and value everyone, no matter what your given skill set or present circumstance may be.


Our new applicant has completed our online application and needs your reference to become a member. 
Because there is so much trust involved in exchanging between neighbors, we do reference checks on all potential members. 
Please complete the form below at your earliest convenience. 
We invite you to find out more about our organization and explore the benefits of joining, just as Our new applicant has! 

Find out more at http://www.familyinvolvementcenter.org!
